Uses of Interface
org.apache.twill.filesystem.LocationFactory

Packages that use LocationFactory
org.apache.twill.filesystem Contains HDFS location classes. 
org.apache.twill.yarn Classes in this package implement the Twill API for Apache Hadoop YARN.

          Creates a LocationFactory that always applies the giving namespace prefix.
